name: Dip The Frog
description:
Follow the story of a joyful little frog who goes on an adventure in this super-tight platformer.

Learn to master new gameplay and navigate a variety of levels created by the developer and the community!

With the help of your tongue, propel yourself at full speed, and swing around the world!

Extreme chapters to unlock, built for the bravest frogs.

Simple and accessible controls, just hang on, pull and swing.

Content

  • Level Editor - Create your own levels and share your creations with our level editor!
  • Speedrun support
  • Modding support
